DOC.brief_summary: This trial assessed the safety and efficacy of a single dose of lumiracoxib 400 mg compared to placebo and to a single dose of celecoxib 200mg. It also assessed safety and efficacy of 400mg lumiracoxib administered once a day for 7 days compared to placebo and to 200 mg celecoxib twice daily.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Osteoarthritis of the knee Pain intensity at baseline of at least 50mm on a 100mm visual analog scale Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
